billhistory.lastaction: 02/10/2015 H Referred to Homeland Security & Public Safety: Feb 10 2015 11:34AM
billhistory.caption: Relating to the carrying of handguns; providing for the open carrying of handguns; removing the requirement that a person who may lawfully possess handguns obtain a Concealed Handgun License in order to carry a handgun lawfully in the state of Texas, and conforming changes.
billhistory.coauthors: Keough | Krause | Leach | Rinaldi | Shaheen | Simpson | Spitzer | Tinderholt | White, James | White, Molly | Zedler

action.description: Referred to Homeland Security & Public Safety
